item.description:
For those of you gearing up for Sunday's 30-mile ride, consider this a great opportunity to get in some carbs (and hops, and barley). Those of you who aren't....well, just consider it a good time!

We had fun at Waxy O'Connors in Foxboro so we're moving over a town and dating his brother, Casey O'Connors in Mansfield.

After some confusion over when last week's happy hour/meet-up began, this note: arrive when you can/want. I'll be there between 6:30-7:00 but they still sell beer even when I'm not physically in the bar (weird, right?)

Hope to see you all there!

Cheers,
Bethany
item.name: *Gulp* More Guzzle Without the Grind
